KH.content: acc. Hegel, nothing serious, only mythology in introductions
KH.linkedContent: acc. Hegel, nothing serious, only mythology in introductions

DS.content: mimēsis imitates a mnēmē (a past present) > “hope,” anamnesis (future as past present due to return), the preface, the anterior future (future perfect) arrange things
DS.linkedContent: mimēsis imitates a mnēmē (a past present) > “hope,” anamnesis (future as past present due to return), the preface, the anterior future (future perfect) arrange things

O.content: preface announces what will already have been written > Derrida claims preface presages a general practice of deconstruction, strange strategy w/out finality, cette défaillance organisatrice of telos or eschaton, which reinscribes restricted economy in general economy——[is this because the preface is an essential and ludicrous operation attempting to cancel out all displacement?] ——pre of preface: reduces future to form of manifest presence
O.linkedContent: preface announces what will already have been written > Derrida claims preface presages a general practice of deconstruction, strange strategy w/out finality, cette défaillance organisatrice of telos or eschaton, which reinscribes restricted economy in general economy——[is this because the preface is an essential and ludicrous operation attempting to cancel out all displacement?] ——pre of preface: reduces future to form of manifest presence

O.content: protocol of preface destroys future anterior > a gluing (kollon), praefatio, prae-fari, protokollon as formula, pharmacopoeia, begins (law of dissemination) doubled by a “facing,” divides/undoes inaugural pretention of first page: neither depth, nor surface, in or for itself, un bloc magique
O.linkedContent: protocol of preface destroys future anterior > a gluing (kollon), praefatio, prae-fari, protokollon as formula, pharmacopoeia, begins (law of dissemination) doubled by a “facing,” divides/undoes inaugural pretention of first page: neither depth, nor surface, in or for itself, un bloc magique

O.content: essence of philosophical duty: do w/out preface
O.linkedContent: essence of philosophical duty: do w/out preface

O.content: preface as gossipy, chit-chat

O.content: preface as excrement of philosophical essentiality? that which falls away (la tombée) > can we account for preface differently?

O.content: graft w/out body, bias w/out front, skew w/out line

O.content: for Hegel, necessity of preface belongs to Bildung, external necessity of concept’s self-presentation, must take time into account as the existence (Dasein) of concept [legibility]

O.content: preface needed where there’s spacing btwn concept & being-there, concept & existence, thought & time

O.content: time as time of preface, space as space of preface > preface: entire location & duration of book

O.content: preface like math, formality exterior to concept [Derrida is the greatest mathematician]

O.content: double topography, double face, overwritten erasure of Hegel’s preface [undeclared double mark?]

O.content: for Hegel, preface has some affinity w/ math: a machine devoid of meaning or life

O.content: Hegel: proof of science/logic solely in necessity of emergency (Hervorbringung), a räsonierende (ratiocinative, discursive) manner produces historical knowledge

O.content: in Hegelian concept of method, self-presentation of concept (l’être auprès de soi du logos absolu) is true pre-face, essential pre-dicate of all writing

O.content: acc. Hegel’s logic of method, preface would either already be part of whole, those not unique, or it would escape the whole and be nothing, be hollow

O.content: why is the critique of formalism, of math, explained precisely in the preface? what is this third term? these fallen, dead signs? that can’t be inside philosophy nor in margins of book

O.content: in thus remaining [outside of oppositions, i.e. sensible/intelligible], does a preface exist? son espacement (préface à une relecture) s’écarte au lieu de la khōra > remarkable limen of the text: what can be read of dissemination > limen: mark, march, margin, mise en marche: citation

O.content: why introduction, for Hegel, is necessary, whereas preface is not: opens a particular philosophical science > Hegel touches on paleonymy
O.linkedContent: why introduction, for Hegel, is necessary, whereas preface is not: opens a particular philosophical science > Hegel touches on paleonymy

O.content: boredom w/ preface, impatience, preface as criticism or play-acting, opening up labyrinth of supplementary digression [Tale of Tub, marginal trap of La Nouvelle Héloise]

O.content: Marx avoids formal anticipation in his preface to Capital [?] asserts difference in form btwn Darstellungsweise (method of presentation) and Forschungsweise (method of inquiry)

O.content: preface can only  be a discourse on method, a set of formal rules, after forging of irruptive track of a method that constructs itself w/ no predetermined itinerary [artifice of preface]

O.content: preface as father assuring/assisting his work, his son, idealizing, mastering his seed, auto-, homo-, re-insemination, btwn father & son alone > narcissism as law, on par w/ law, figure of Platonic boētheia (coming to aid of speech, helping logos): even better if just father, preface useless
